item.description:
You worked all week so it's time to take a break from cooking and have some fun! There will be a free buffet or you can order off the bar menu. The prices go up to $12 and have a good selection including appetizers, salads, and sandwiches. Johnny Rae's is known to have a crowd with ages ranging from 30s - 60s. Their web site is located at: www.johnnyraysrestaurant.com
For those of you who feel like dancing afterward, the CT based band Fast Lane is scheuled to preform 9:00. They play a little bit of everything. From classic, 70s dance, Motown, and southern rock. I will not be able to stay to hear them but they have been getting great reviews. Their web site - www.fastlane.net .
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Annette with Party Express

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party Express goes to Happy Hour at Johnny Rae's Restaurant
